args:
Does this describe a specific, new, official action or formal announcement already taken/made by the Trump administration? Answer only "yes" or "no".
‘Interviewing two brothers:’ Trump, Musk speak about relationship
Seated side-by-side on prime-time television, President Donald Trump raved about Elon Musk’s intellect and business acumen to Fox News host Sean Hannity, insisting during a joint interview that their relationship is thriving as they seek to reshape the federal government together.
“Well, I respect him,” Trump said. “I’ve always respected him. I never knew that he was right on certain things, and I’m usually pretty good at this stuff.”
Trump said he “wanted to find someone smarter than him,” but “couldn’t do it.”
The interview comes amid mounting outside scrutiny of Musk’s role within the White House — and whether his fate will resemble past outspoken advisers Trump booted in his first term.
Referring to the world’s richest man as “actually a very good businessman,” Trump said that Musk has ensured that his flurry of executive orders are being enforced, but steered clear of saying Musk was the brains behind any of them.
“He gets it done,” Trump said. Musk, for his part, described himself as “tech support” for carrying out Trump’s executive orders.
“I feel like I’m interviewing two brothers here,” Hannity said.
